title: Guardians of Technology looking for a coach
body:
We are a rookie team searching for a dedicated and enthusiastic coach for our team.
Our solo skillcap is currently positioned at D5 and above.
We own a TS3 server, free-to-use.

If you are interested in being a coach for our team, feel free to add me via my Summoner Name: FranzFurious
                                                                                                              or through my Steam-profile: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198057094923/
Your skillcap should atleast be ~Platin 1~ or above.
Good english knowledge is required.
You should be well-informed about the current metagame, about League of Legends in general and be able to adapt to future metagame. 
You may want to take a look at our website. It is in German though: http://www.network-got.com
